channel.title: Chronomancer Glitch
channel.description: #### What happened? As Chronomancer delayed the Prince's Death, Game wouldn't let me redirect it to someone else. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Game should have let me redirect the prince's death to a cultist and we would have won. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Successfully delay a death. 2. Wait a day 3. Try and use Distort Reality #### Comments: http://prntscr.com/l16q60

item.title: Chronomancer Glitch
item.dc:creator: Luxy
item.description:
It was 2 days later.

It wouldn’t let me do either day.

Read full topic

item.title: Chronomancer Glitch
item.dc:creator: Captain
item.description:
This is not a bug, as far as i know you can swap this attack only two days later.

Read full topic

item.title: Chronomancer Glitch
item.dc:creator: Luxy
item.description:
What happened?

As Chronomancer delayed the Prince’s Death, Game wouldn’t let me redirect it to someone else.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Game should have let me redirect the prince’s death to a cultist and we would have won.

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Successfully delay a death.
  2. Wait a day
  3. Try and use Distort Reality

Comments:

http://prntscr.com/l16q60

Read full topic
